page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: I live in a maisonette.I like living there but I would rather live in a bungalow where every thing is on one floor.My parents are looking for a house at the moment.I have lived in three places since I was born.The first a high rise flat where I lived till I was three,then we moved to a maisonette.I like living where I am but soon we shallbe moving to another house.I don't know where it is but I hope it will be nice.There are a lot of large houses in area.Some are detached and some are semi-detached.Many have garages and most have front and back gardens.The average number of bedrooms is three.They all have inside bathroom and W.C.There are also large numbers of flats and maisonettes.Some large blocks of flats are very shabby.
